name: Healing Touch
summary: You gain the appropriate devotion spell for your cause.
description:
You gain the appropriate devotion spell for your cause (lay on hands for the paladin, redeemer, and liberator). If you donâ€™t already have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point, which you can Refocus by praying or serving your deity.Traits
